content: this cowl knits up quickly and is easily modified to your own preference on sizing use two variegated yarns for maximum texture or use one variegated and one solid for a less busy look finished size 11 tall 26 diameter at the bottom and 20 at the top you can adjust this to make any size cowl you want i happen to like cowls that sit close to my neck to make larger circumference add additional stitches in quantities of 10 yarn two 200-yard skeins of sport weight yarn in coordinating or contrasting colors sample is knit in spincycle dyed in the wool colorways pick your poison mc -- blue and salty dog cc -- yellow finished sample had some extra of both yarns so sizing up should not require any more skeins gauge 5 4 stitches to the inch on #5 needles 16-inch or 20-inch circular needle required gauge is only critical when determining your sizing adjust needle sizes to get the fabric look you prefer
